title: [android] SyntaxError: Use of const in strict mode.

comments.body:
I replace all `const` to `var`.
Another error =_=:
```log
02-18 17:16:05.977 12126-12174/com.alibaba.weex E/jsengine:  ReportException :undefined:3500: SyntaxError: Unexpected token ILLEGAL
02-18 17:16:05.987 12126-12174/com.alibaba.weex E/jsengine:  ReportException : SyntaxError: Unexpected token ILLEGAL




                                                                at Cn ((weex):2:4300)
                                                                at wn ((weex):2:4205)
                                                                at Object.En [as createInstance] ((weex):2:5135)
                                                                at Object.R [as createInstance] ((weex):1:7385)
                                                                at global.(anonymous function) ((weex):7:1148)
02-18 17:16:05.988 12126-12174/com.alibaba.weex E/weex: reportJSException >>>> instanceId:1, exception function:createInstance, exception:SyntaxError: Unexpected token ILLEGAL
```
again, iOS is perfect...

Online demos (You can scan it on different devices):

| File | QR code |
| --- | --- |
| [index-with-strict-error.js](https://static.toomao.com/bug-report/weex/index-with-strict-error.js) | ![strict-error.png](https://static.toomao.com/bug-report/weex/strict-error.png) |
| [index-with-ILLEGAL-error.js](https://static.toomao.com/bug-report/weex/index-with-ILLEGAL-error.js) | ![illegal-error.png](https://static.toomao.com/bug-report/weex/illegal-error.png) |

Attention!

| Device | Mode | Result |
| --- | --- | --- |
| ios | normal | OK |
| ios | debug | OK |
| android | normal | ERROR |
| android | debug | OK |

body:
Android: Redmi Note 3
Playground: Latest version on dev brance
A page when i set `WXEnvironment.sRemoteDebugMode` to true is correct, but an ERROR occured if `WXEnvironment.sRemoteDebugMode` is false.

What's different between debug mode and normal mode.

```log
02-18 16:46:30.371 7470-7497/com.alibaba.weex E/jsengine:  ReportException :undefined:3437: SyntaxError: Use of const in strict mode.
02-18 16:46:30.376 7470-7497/com.alibaba.weex E/jsengine:  ReportException : SyntaxError: Use of const in strict mode.
                                                              at Cn ((weex):2:4300)
                                                              at wn ((weex):2:4205)
                                                              at Object.En [as createInstance] ((weex):2:5135)
                                                              at Object.R [as createInstance] ((weex):1:7385)
                                                              at global.(anonymous function) ((weex):7:1148)
02-18 16:46:30.376 7470-7497/com.alibaba.weex E/weex: reportJSException >>>> instanceId:1, exception function:createInstance, exception:SyntaxError: Use of const in strict mode.
```

oh, by the way, iOS is perfect!
